mapper.select: SELECT CASE #{week} WHEN 1 THEN a.sectionFee1 WHEN 2 THEN a.sectionFee2 WHEN 3 THEN a.sectionFee3 WHEN 4 THEN a.sectionFee4 END + a.monthFee AS Fee FROM globalbiz.SubjTuitionInfo AS a INNER JOIN globalbiz.DeptMst AS b ON a.deptType = b.deptType AND a.memType = b.memType AND a.feeType = b.feeType WHERE b.deptCD = #{deptCD} AND a.bookNum = #{bookNum}

SELECT a.memKey, CONCAT(IFNULL(mFstName,''),' ', IFNULL(mLstName,'')) AS memName, CONCAT(IFNULL(gFstName,''),' ', IFNULL(gLstName,'')) AS guardianName, addr AS address, city, gPhone AS phone, MIN(statusCD) AS statusCD, globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM(b.jisaCD,'0008', MIN(statusCD),'','') AS statusName FROM globalbiz.MemMst AS a INNER JOIN globalbiz.MemSubjMst AS b ON a.memKey = b.memKey WHERE b.jisaCD = #{jisaCD} AND b.deptCD = CASE WHEN statusCD = '1' THEN #{deptCD} WHEN statusCD = '2' THEN b.deptCD END AND CONCAT(mFstName, mLstName) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') OR CONCAT(gFstName, gLstNAme) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') GROUP BY a.memKey
SELECT * FROM globalbiz.MemSubjMst WHERE memKey = #{memKey} ORDER BY statusCD

SELECT a.jisaCD, a.deptCD, a.subj, a.studyNum AS subjStudyNum, a.bookNum AS subjBookNum, a.monthNum AS subjMonthNum, a.digYN AS subjDigYN, a.sortCD, b.memKey, b.statusCD, b.yoil, globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM(a.jisaCD,'0006',b.yoil,'E','Y') AS yoilName, b.studyNum, b.bookNum, b.visitHours, globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM(a.jisaCD,'0206',b.visitHours,'','Y') AS visitHoursName FROM globalbiz.DeptSubjInfo AS a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT aa.memKey, aa.subj, statusCD, aa.yoil, aa.studyNum, aa.bookNum, bb.visitHours FROM globalbiz.MemSubjMst AS aa INNER JOIN globalbiz.MemSubjStudy AS bb ON aa.memKey = bb.memKey AND aa.subj = bb.subj WHERE aa.memKey = #{memKey} ) AS b ON a.subj = b.subj WHERE a.jisaCD = #{jisaCD} AND a.deptCD = #{deptCD} ORDER BY -b.statusCD DESC, a.sortCD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO globalbiz.MemMst (memKey, mFstName, mLstName, mBirthDay, gradeCD, schoolName, mEmail, eContact, ePhone, gFstName, gLstName, city, stateCD, zip, addr, gEmail, gPhone, gCellPhone, registWhy, registWhyEtc, registHow, registHowEtc, remarks, regDate, regID, updDate, updID) VALUES(#{memKey}, #{mFstName}, #{mLstName}, #{mBirthDay}, #{gradeCD}, #{schoolName}, #{mEmail}, #{eContact}, #{ePhone}, #{gFstName}, #{gLstName}, #{city}, #{stateCD}, #{zip}, #{addr}, #{gEmail}, #{gPhone}, #{gCellPhone}, IFNULL(#{registWhy},''), IFNULL(#{registWhyEtc},''), IFNULL(#{registHow},''), IFNULL(#{registHowEtc},''), #{remarks}, #{regDate}, #{regID}, #{updDate}, #{updID})
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN c.freeType IS NOT NULL THEN 0 ELSE registFee END AS registFee, b.monthFee, CASE #{weekNum} WHEN 1 THEN b.sectionFee1 WHEN 2 THEN b.sectionFee2 WHEN 3 THEN b.sectionFee3 WHEN 4 THEN b.sectionFee4 END AS sectionFee, b.feeUnit, IFNULL(c.freeType, '') AS freeType FROM globalbiz.DeptMst AS a INNER JOIN globalbiz.SubjTuitionInfo AS b ON a.deptType = b.deptType AND a.memType = b.memType AND a.feeType = b.feeType LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.freeType, a.jisaCD, b.deptCD, a.startYMD, a.endYMD FROM MemFeeFreeTermGroup a INNER JOIN MemFeeFreeTerm b ON(a.idx=b.mftIdx) ) AS c ON a.jisaCD = c.jisaCD AND a.deptCD = c.deptCD AND NOW() BETWEEN c.startYMD AND c.endYMD WHERE a.deptCD = #{deptCD}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO globalbiz.MemSubjMst (memKey, subj, statusCD, memName, yoil, studyNum, bookNum, digGrade, registFstYMD, registFnlYMD, dropFnlYMD, expireYMD, feeFnlYMD, yoilChgYMD, studyNumChgYMD, bookNumChgYMD, befoYoil, befoStudyNum, befoBookNum, empKey, deptCD, jisaCD, regDate, regID, updDate, updID) VALUES(#{memKey}, #{subj}, #{statusCD}, #{memName}, #{yoil}, #{studyNum}, #{bookNum}, #{digGrade}, #{registFstYMD}, #{registFnlYMD}, #{dropFnlYMD}, #{expireYMD}, #{feeFnlYMD}, #{yoilChgYMD}, #{studyNumChgYMD}, #{bookNumChgYMD}, #{befoYoil}, #{befoStudyNum}, #{befoBookNum}, #{empKey}, #{deptCD}, #{jisaCD}, #{regDate}, #{regID}, #{updDate}, #{updID})
